entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
This is my first post in my Github based blog. I have no blogging experience but Iâ€™ll do my best and share things about I like as much as I can.

I created this blog following the Github Pages. If you would like to do the same you can start from here. In order to see my blog locally, I also installed all the components such as Ruby, RubyGems, Bundler and Jekyll on my computer. The instructions are clearly described in Github Pages link. I saw many nice blogs using Jekyll-Bootstrap (JB) and wanted to build my blog on top of it too. So as a next step I cloned the files and read the documentation from this link. After a few small modifications, I pushed my local files and folders to Github.

Files that I modified initially are:

  • _config.yml
  • index.md

I would like to keep this first post short so that I can focus on the modifications.
